references.paper_title: Representation learning: A review and new perspectives
references.reason: This paper provides a foundational overview of representation learning, which is the core concept behind disentangled representation learning (DRL), the main focus of the current research.

references.paper_title: beta-vae: Learning basic visual concepts with a constrained variational framework
references.reason: This paper introduces the beta-VAE, a crucial model used in many DRL approaches, which is directly relevant to the current research's methodology.

references.paper_title: Challenging common assumptions in the unsupervised learning of disentangled representations
references.reason: This paper critically examines common assumptions in unsupervised DRL, highlighting limitations that are directly addressed in the presented work.

references.paper_title: CausalVAE: Disentangled representation learning via neural structural causal models
references.reason: This work explores causal DRL, a related area that addresses the correlation between factors, which is similar to the approach in this study.
This review paper comprehensively summarizes the existing works on disentangled representation learning, offering valuable context and highlighting areas where improvements can be made.
